parts: (a)    what the daily national consumption of the following types of fuel is:

(c)    what the strategic reserve of the fuel at any given time is; and
(d)    which oil marketing company has the largest storage capacity in the country.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry when the Government will facilitate the setting up of the following industries in the Western Province
parts: (a)    timber processing plant; and
(b)    rice processing plant. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W16    Mr Ntundu (Gwembe) - to ask the Minister of Home Affairs:
(a)    when the amnesty for surrendering illegally acquired firearms commenced;
(b)    how many firearms have since been surrendered, province by province;
(c)    whether the firearms at (b) have been disposed of and, if so, how; and
(d)    when the amnesty period will expire. W17    Mr Katuka (Mwinilunga) - to ask the Minister of Tourism and Art:
(a)    when Zambia last exported the following species of animals to other countries:
(i)    elephant; (ii)    rhino; (iii)    buffalo; and (iv)    lion;
(b)    how much money was raised from the export of the animals;
(c)    how many Zambians acquired hunting licences from 2011 to 2013, year by year; and

(d)    what the policy on hunting wild animals for provision of meat for consumption at traditional ceremonies is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    The Service Commissions (Amendment) Bill            (N.A.B. 21/2013) Second Reading
